dublin_core.dcvalue: Sharon Jiae Kim Program Manager Country Operations at the One Million Community Health Workers Campaign at the Earth Institute Columbia University gave this presentation at the December 12 2013 meeting of the mHealth Working Group The presentation is an overview about the campaign a deep dive into their Operations Room and includes a proposal for national CHW registries which was recently co presented with iHRIS at WHO s Health Workforce Information Group session during the Brazil Forum
One Million Community Health Workers Campaign
